Judgment Calculator

Most judgments awarded in New York State before April 30, 2022 accrue interest at 9% per year, or 0.75 per month. On the other hand, judgments awarded after April 30, 2022 accrue interest at 2% per year, or 0.167 percent per month. This calculator will help you estimate the total value and amount of interest earned on a court-awarded judgment in the state of New York. To start, enter the amount of the original judgment award.

Judgment Calculator

On the other hand, judgments awarded after April 30, 2022 accrue interest at 2% per year, or 0.167 percent per month. *Any amounts obtained using this calculator are based on your input and are only intended as an estimate. Other contributing factors may impact the value of your judgment. For more information on the exact value of your judgment, or to start the collection process contact us.
